sub_title: Digital Marketing Campaign Manager at PwC
summary:
Digital marketing professional with over 14 years of experience. Worked in different types of organisations including C&A Europe, Royal Philips, OnePlus, KiKa and PwC. 

Results include:

• Increased web traffic with 38% through CRM initiatives
• Redesign brand identity and increased the brand awareness
• Drove revenue gains of 30% in tough economy for C&A Online

Specialties: campaigning, E-Commerce, analytics, data driven marketing, social media, social networks, CRM, trends, design, concepts, DTP, HTML and CSS.

profile_positions.description:
At PwC in the Netherlands, more than five thousand people work together from twelve different offices and from three perspectives: Assurance, Tax & Legal and Advisory. We want our services to contribute building trust in society and solving important problems. We want to add value to our customers, our people and society. That is our purpose and the touchstone for everything we do or want to do.

o Coordinate (digital) marketing campaigns and communication. 
o Organize project meetings, keep track of project planning and activities and identify bottlenecks in the planning. 
o Develop (together with internal and external parties) marketing campaigns and communication concepts with an emphasis on the digital channels (display, OLV, paid social, SEA, etc.). 
o Determine KPI’s along the customer journey. 
o Brief campaigns/projecs to designers, agencies and copywriters and monitor the quality of the output.
o Evaluate campaigns and propose optimization for follow-up campaigns.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Campaign Manager

profile_positions.description:
KiKa Children Cancer-free Foundation is the only charity in the Netherlands that funds research on all forms of childhood cancer. KiKa raises funds for innovative research and other activities in the field of childhood cancer, aimed at less pain, more cure and a better quality of life. Furthermore, KiKa focuses on education on childhood cancer. KiKa is the main financial supporter of the Princess Máxima Center. 

o Determining and coordinating the digital marketing strategy and planning. 
o Create and optimize email marketing and marketing automation campaigns with Clang.
o Improve the user experience on the (mobile) websites. 
o Providing insight into the digital marketing results and updating the digital marketing dashboards.
o Setting up and optimising Google AdWords, SEO, Social Media Ads and Display campaigns.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
OnePlus creates beautifully designed products with premium build quality & brings the best technology to users around the world. No tradeoffs, we # NeverSettle.

o Creating and curating (shareable) content; determining which platform or media channel is best suited for each piece of content. 
o Building and managing social media profiles and presence. 
o Directing paid search and social campaigns and analysing the performance of those campaigns. Output best practices for future projects. 
o Managing the online platform and E-commerce environment. 
o Maintaining brand consistency across all messaging and channels.
o Manage project budget, from planning to allocation and reporting.
o Track industry trends, competitor best practices and propose activities to promote ongoing. campaigns and products.
o Media agency management.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing and Channel Manager

profile_positions.location: Alphen aan den Rijn, South Holland Province, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
Vakmedianet is the leading business-to-business publisher in new and established media channels. Our expert editors offer tailor-made professional information for more than 1.2 million professionals in fields and branches.

o Development and expand the (online) marketing strategy for Cobouw. 
o Data driven marketing. Make analysis to determine or improve the online strategy.
o Develop online marketing strategies for new products, services and events (cross-selling strategy).
o Optimize the online customer journey for the Cobouw group.
o Guarantee the branding of Cobouw and Cobouw Data Solutions.
o Responsible for the launch of digital marketing and lead generation campaigns (SEO, SEA, display, mobile marketing, affiliate marketing, etc.).
o Responsible for developing and integrating (intelligent) content marketing strategies (including social).
o I work closely with other marketers, account managers and editors in multidisciplinary teams.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketer Cobouw

profile_positions.description:
Projects:

September 2014 - December 2016
Hired by Philips - Digital Services Campaign Manager

January 2017 - April 2018
Hired by Philips - Digital Services Business Partner Markets for B2C and B2B
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Project:

Hired by Philips - DS Business Partner

Key Areas of Responsibility:
1. Smooth operation
Coordinate within the DS tracks/consult for the best route within DS. Split projects in smaller parts that can be handled in different streams (as little B2O as possible) to make the realization of their request as efficient and effective as possible (both for our stakeholder and DS)
Coordinate escalations/incidents
Optimize paths to completion that may not follow the standard routes.
Work within DS to improve services, support & processes
Work within team to investigate new possibilities/functionalities
2. Plan for demand
Make sure DS Self Service/Guided Service/Projects/Operations can plan ahead on foreseen demand. 
Report on upcoming campaigns and projects to Self-Service and B2O teams.
Be involved in the marketing planning of the business, ideally at an early stage.
Check the use of the OCC & review with Stakeholders.
3. Drive stakeholder satisfaction
Make Account Plans in which the hard operational needs for the coming term are addressed, but also the soft needs (motivation, cooperation, politics, development, etc.). These plans are made with the input of the stakeholder, the DIM and other relevant parts of DS.
Improve quality/performance of (running) campaigns
Frequent alignment. Schedule regular reviews of past campaigns and future planning.
Reporting out on activities, successes and costs.
Translate changing needs into DS propositions.
Become strategical partners to work on marketing together with the stakeholders.
4. Offer marketing insights
Best practice and knowledge sharing 
Work with Analytics coordinators to develop reporting for Stakeholders that benefits both them & DS (structural use of analytics, ClickView, A/B tests).
Present findings with actionable recommendations for implementation. 
Connecting businesses to share knowledge.
 5. Manage costs
Manage operations to be in fixed costs as much as possible.
Communicate and coordinate on B2O costs.
profile_positions.title: Digital Services Business Partner Markets for B2C and B2B

profile_positions.description:
Project:

Hired by Philips - Digital Services Campaign Manager

o Responsible for intake form (completeness of requirements and assets), DAP adherence / qualitative briefing and quotation agreement
o Responsible for registration of the approved campaign quotes
o Responsible for addressing scope changes during execution of a campaign
o Responsible for (campaign) advisory during requirements phase:
 - Target audience
 - Campaign flow advisory
 - Campaign reporting
o Responsible for business campaign progress reporting (parent tickets) and dashboards
o Responsible for coordination of campaign approval and parent ticket closure
o Responsible for campaign closure
o Acts as single point of escalation for all campaign related matters.
o Continuously advises on running campaigns and optimizes where required, taking into account campaign KPI dashboards.
profile_positions.title: Digital Services Campaign Manager

profile_positions.description:
o Campaign & Project Management for European campaigns, coordination with external parties, planning and managing the budget. 
o Responsible for photo shoots. Image shootings with models. The pictures are used on all the landing-pages in the Online Shop.
o Realization of all marketing actions to promote sales in coordination with the Country Marketing Manager for Netherlands and Belgium. 
o Responsible for the conception and realization of advertising materials, newsletters, landing pages and start pages for the C&A Netherlands and Belgium Online Shops. 
o Observing the competition and identifying trends for further developing online marketing activities. 
o Management of internal interfaces and external service providers and agencies.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager E-Commerce | The Netherlands/Belgium at C&A Online GmbH
